name: Bosses of Flesh
description:
Bosses of Flesh Disgusting flesh monsters have broke into the space prison you were kept in, now you'll have to fight them if you want to break out !

Created for the Boss Rush Jam 2021

If the game doesn't load here, try downloading the version specific to your platform.

Controls:
KeyboardControllerMove
WASD / ZQSDLeft stick
Dash
SpaceL1 / L2
Attack
Left click
A (Xbox) / X (Dualshock)
ShootRight click
Right stick
Credits:

Geegaz - code, art, design

Josh Flynn - sound

Konkombre - music

Fonts used: Jupiter Crash by Ænigma Fonts and BitPotion by Joeb Rogers

Listen to the OST on Soundcloud : Bosses of Flesh - complete soundtrack

Special thanks to Dealgaro and the BRJ community !
